review.title: The softest most sumptuous tissue
review.author: A Tesco Customer
review.text: These are the softest tissues I could find.   I had an operation on my eye and needed something to use once and throw away to avoid infection.  It needed to be so, so soft and gentle - these were perfect.   Now I can only use these tissues for everyday use as well - you know how it is, once you've tried something wonderful, you feel cheated by anything less... even if a little pricier - I would say well worth it.  Especially when on offer!

review.title: Excellent quality, worth the cost
review.author: A Tesco Customer
review.text: I bought these because the ones we usually use weren't available, but now they are my favourite. Very strong sheets, larger than most and they do have a nice pattern in blue and white. I like the ones with designs and colours but these make up for the lack of cute flowers or animals with great quality.

review.title: Poor quality
review.author: A Tesco Customer
review.text: Rubbish, not strong, always tears, but never at the perforations where it is supposed to.  Sheds layers onto food or surfaces. Does not stay in one piece.

review.title: Thick, absorbent worth the additional cost.
review.author: A Tesco Customer
review.text: I have tried many kitchen towels and in my opinion this is the best better even than the well known P****Y brand.  It is blue and white in colour, it is wonderfully thicker than most and it does not disintegrate on contact with fluids.  I would like more sheets to the roll but this is larger than the standard ones.   I do think its a little expensive but you get what you pay for, that said if it goes up yet again I will sadly be looking for an alternative.

review.title: Currently dire - fall apart after 1 use or less!!
review.author: A Tesco Customer
review.text:
Like many I prefer to have not only 3-ply tissues, but decent sized ones & preferably really soft, so I figured these would be better than the usual "ordinary" mansize compact I regularly use.  But they have a major flaw  - yes they're 3 ply, soft & large BUT firstly when you open the box, they look as if they've been stuffed in as they're not flat like the other type but crumpled.  The bigger issue tho is that they fall apart the minute you've pulled them out of the box - so instead of 3 ply sometimes you find yourself left using 1 or 2 as you struggle to keep them together to use.  I've now tried 3 different boxes from 2 different outlets & they're all the same.

However, I've bought these during the pandemic lockdown when everything is affected to one degree or another  so accept that perhaps it's just been a manufacturing issue at present under the current restrictions or maybe we've just had bad batches sent here.  I hope so, as I'd be very happy otherwise.  But for now - stick to the basic 3 ply boxes & leave these alone unless there's absolutely nothing else to buy :(   Would be useful to know if others find the same problem.

bought_next.title: Dettol Surface Cleanser Antibacterial Spray 500 Ml

items.description: Ora, The All Round Household Towel 100 sheets Meet Ora The super strong and endlessly versatile all-round household towel, that's ready for just about anything. Perfect for cleaning, cooking, baking, catering, napkins, snacks, placemats, painting, craft, pet messes, gardening and so much more. Ora's extra compact stack fits neatly into your hand and your life. It's so economical and eco-friendly you'll wonder how you've rolled along for so long without it! Ora is the world's first household towel with round sheets. Each sheet fits your hand perfectly for an effortless one-hand grab and offers countless uses beyond traditional household tasks. Its unique and innovative stacking design, with no inner cardboard tube, provides twice the number of sheets compared to a traditional kitchen towel roll. With no perforations, it offers an easy one-hand grab so there is no tearing, no unravelling and no wastage making it an eco-friendlier purchase. Ora's innovative and bold design not only challenges conventions of what a household towel should look like but has ensured there is less packaging and fewer trucks on the road.
items.address: Better All Round, Hurlingham Business Pk, Grantham, NG32 3HL.
items.return: Better All Round, Hurlingham Business Pk, Grantham, NG32 3HL. 0800 112 3010 info@ora-home.com www.ora-home.com

review.author: A Tesco Customer
review.text: Not worth the money whatsoever. There are barely few sheets. Tesco paper towel lasts much longer. I bought it on half price and I wouldn’t get that again even if it costs 30% of the price. Sheets are very small and the do soak fluids well, but it’s nothing spectacular especially for this price.

review.title: Highly recommend! You won't be disappointed!
review.author: A Tesco Customer
review.text: Amazing! Amazing! Amazing!  So useful as I can take one piece at a time and there is no waste. Nice and thick. I stock up when they are on offer, but they are well worth it so would, and have, paid the normal price.

review.title: Convenient and great value...
review.author: A Tesco Customer
review.text: Two stand-out points about Ora - it can be used one-handed and it's VERY long lasting. Why it lasts longer than an average kitchen roll is because every sheet is separate, so no tearing off two or three sheets at a time for tasks that probably require much less. I started my first pack of Ora about a week before Christmas and it lasted until around the start of the third week in January. I reckon this is twice as good as my regular kitchen roll. Concerned that Ora's circular sheets may not be as useful? - don't be. There's only one job I found they didn't work on - turning home made granola out onto from baking trays to cool and remove some of the grease. I probably make granola once a month. Otherwise this is equal in quality to my regular kitchen roll - but much more economical. A lot of thought's obviously gone into this product - the small cone it's dispensed from is fully biodegradable too.

review.title: brilliant
review.author: A Tesco Customer
review.text: This is an excellent product. please make it more available

review.title: This has to be the BEST ever kitchen towel.   I lo
review.author: A Tesco Customer
review.text: This has to be the BEST ever kitchen towel.   I love it so strong and so useful for laying a tray just the right shape.  Amazing product I will not use 'normal' kitchen towel again.   THANK YOU.

review.title: Usually a roll lasts us 2/3 days as we usually end
review.author: A Tesco Customer
review.text: Usually a roll lasts us 2/3 days as we usually end up pulling 2 or 3 sheets off because its so thin and you don't think about taking just one sheet but this has lasted 2 weeks as you really can only pick up one sheet. The quality is so good for spills and taking excess water off washed salads, oils off food etc..and its eco-friendly
